name: Wild Deer Shoot Game
description:
Wild Deer Shoot Game is the forest world best animal hunting experience with wild lion games. Real sniper challenge wild animal hunt games 3d is one the world’s most famous and advance wild hunter game with realistic 3D environment of snow forest.
Features:

• First person jungle sniper hunting.
• Smooth and efficient weapon control.
• Realistic animal and deer hunting games graphics.
• World’s most advanced sniper with accurate scope focus and magazine.
• Realistic 3D environment of beautiful woodland.
• Ultra High definition (HD) display.
